Captions.InvalidOperation: 💀 I' ll call the admin now and tell him that you don't know how to use it!

Captions.WarnedSuccessfully:
*🎁 Time for presents!*

{MentionedUser}, you have received *{MentionedUser.Warnings} out of {Configuration.MaxWarnings}* warnings from the group administration.

You have probably broken the rules of the chat or shown unacceptable behaviour. If you collect all the warnings, your stay in this group will be forcibly terminated. 😶
Captions.UnwarnedSuccessfully:
🥺 {MentionedUser}, your warning has been cancelled, the gift has been confiscated.

Current warnings: *{MentionedUser.Warnings} / {Configuration.MaxWarnings}*
Captions.BannedSuccessfully:
*🎁 Time for presents!*

Participant {MentionedUser} has collected a winning collection of alerts and receives a one-way ticket from this group. 🛫
